properties.name: entityUuid
properties.description: Component UuId in the multi tenant core

properties.name: configurationDomainPath
properties.description: Core multi tenant path, for example https://d-core-multitenant.novopayment.net

properties.name: hazelcastYmlPath
properties.description: Configuration path for Hazelcast, the core multi tenant loader configuration cache manager

properties.name: coreTenantConnectTimeout
properties.description: maximum waiting time for connection with the multi tenant core

properties.name: coreTenantReadTimeout
properties.description: maximum waiting time for the multitenant core information reading or serialization process
